D

dataAccess - package dataAccess
 
DbUtil - Class in connection
DbUtil.java - presents methods used in order to close the created connection; Also, the Statement and the Result Set will be closed after the execution of the Query;
DbUtil() - Constructor for class connection.DbUtil
 
deleteClient(Connection, String) - Method in class dataAccess.ClientDAO
This method deletes a Client object, from the Database, using its name;
deleteProduct(Connection, String) - Method in class dataAccess.ProductDAO
This method deletes a Product object, from the Database, using its name;
